ROOT.GetTableEditColumn: select title, fieldname, isidentity, coltype, datasource, width, minwidth, isfilter from dbTableEditColumn where tablename={0}
ROOT.GetFlowListColumns: select title, key, width, align from tbFlowListInfo where flowid={0} order by idx
ROOT.GetFlowSearchInfo: select title, type, datasource, field from tbFlowSearchInfo where flowid={0} order by idx
